subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso won the Italian Grand Prix at Monza, beating Lewis Hamilton and closing within 3 points of Hamilton, his McLaren teammate, at the top of the drivers’ standings. Alonso beat Hamilton by more than six seconds on the 3.6-mile Autodromo Nazionale di Monza course.
